/*! bitws-js 03-05-2016 */
function deriveKeys(a,b,c,d){var e,f,g,h=a+b,i=checkBytes(h);d?(f=sjcl.codec.hex.toBits(d),e=d):(f=sjcl.random.randomWords(16/WORDSIZE),e=sjcl.codec.hex.fromBits(f)),g=c?Math.max(c,5e3):ITERCOUNT+Math.abs(sjcl.random.randomWords(1)[0]%1024);var j=sjcl.misc.pbkdf2(h,f,g),k=Mnemonic.fromSeed(keyToBuffer(j),Mnemonic.Words.ENGLISH),l=recoverKeys(k);return{payload:{username:a,check:i,salt:e,iterations:g},key:l,mnemonic:k.toString()}}function recoverKeys(a){var b=a instanceof Mnemonic?a:Mnemonic(a),c=b.toHDPrivateKey(),d=c.derive(0,!0),e=c.derive(1,!0),f=c.derive(2,!0),g=sjcl.codec.hex.toBits(d.privateKey.bn.toJSON()),h=e.privateKey,i=e.publicKey.toAddress().toString(),j=e.privateKey.toWIF();return{sign:{key:h,wif:j,address:i,raw:e},encrypt:g,genWallet:f}}function keyToBuffer(a){var b=new ArrayBuffer(32),c=new Int32Array(b),d=new Uint8Array(b);if(c.length!=a.length)throw new Error("Unexpected length");for(var e=0;e<c.length;e++)c[e]=a[e];return new Buffer(d)}function checkBytes(a){var b=sjcl.hash.sha256.hash(a),c=sjcl.codec.hex.fromBits(b),d=c.slice(-6);return d}function privToWif(a){return bitcore.PrivateKey(a).toWIF()}function wifToPriv(a){var b=new bitcore.PrivateKey(a);return{key:b,address:b.publicKey.toAddress().toString()}}function jwtHeader(a){var b={typ:"JWT",alg:"CUSTOM-BITCOIN-SIGN",kid:a};return base64url.encode(stringify(b))}function signSerialize(a,b,c,d){var e=(new Date).getTime()/1e3+3600;d&&d>0&&(e=(new Date).getTime()/1e3+d);var f={aud:a,data:b,exp:e,iat:(new Date).getTime()},g=base64url.encode(stringify(f)),h=jwtHeader(c.publicKey.toAddress().toString())+"."+g,i=base64url.encode(new Message(h).sign(c));return h+"."+i}function validateDeserialize(a,b,c){var d=b.split(".");if(3!=d.length)throw new TypeError("Invalid raw data");if(rawHeader=d[0],rawPayload=d[1],signature=base64url.decode(d[2]),header=JSON.parse(base64url.decode(rawHeader)),key=header.kid,!key)throw new TypeError("Invalid header, missing key id");if(!new Message(rawHeader+"."+rawPayload).verify(key,signature))throw new Error("Signature does not match");if(payload=JSON.parse(base64url.decode(rawPayload)),payload.aud!==a)throw new Error("Audience mismatch ("+payload.aud+" != "+a+")");if(c&&(new Date).getTime()/1e3>payload.exp)throw new Error("Payload expired");return{header:header,payload:payload}}var sjcl=require("sjcl"),bitcore=require("bitcore-lib"),Mnemonic=require("bitcore-mnemonic"),assign=require("object-assign"),Message=require("bitcore-message"),base64url=require("base64-url"),stringify=require("json-stable-stringify"),WORDSIZE=4,ITERCOUNT=1e4;module.exports={signSerialize:signSerialize,validateDeserialize:validateDeserialize,deriveKeys:deriveKeys,recoverKeys:recoverKeys,keyToBuffer:keyToBuffer,checkBytes:checkBytes,privToWif:privToWif,wifToPriv:wifToPriv,bitcore:bitcore};
